[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@bombillazo/error-x](./error-x.md) &gt; [ErrorX](./error-x.errorx.md) &gt; [toString](./error-x.errorx.tostring.md)

## ErrorX.toString() method

Converts the ErrorX instance to a detailed string representation. Includes error name, message, code, timestamp, metadata, and stack trace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toString(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Formatted string representation of the error

## Example


```typescript
const error = new ErrorX({
  message: 'Database connection failed',
  name: 'DatabaseError',
  code: 'DB_CONN_FAILED',
  metadata: { host: 'localhost', port: 5432 }
})

console.log(error.toString())
// Output: "DatabaseError: Database connection failed. [DB_CONN_FAILED] (2024-01-15T10:30:45.123Z) metadata: {...}"
```
